text: The hawk didn’t understand why the ground squirrels didn’t want to be his friend.
Potato wedges probably are not best for relationships.
25 years later, she still regretted that specific moment.
He felt that dining on the bridge brought romance to his relationship with his cat.
She looked at the masterpiece hanging in the museum but all she could think is that her five-year-old could do better.
I want a giraffe, but I'm a turtle eating waffles.
